adrFormatAddress: 353 E 53rd St, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: Vince is really the best of both worlds when it comes to hiring a photographer. He is extremely personable and professional. Very easy to work with, exceptional work, and very timely with his deliverables. His platform is also SUPER user friendly when you need to retrieve photos. Overall he is such a great energy which I personally think is important for taking great photos. Our company continues to hire him for every event we have (almost 3 years now!) which is a true testament to his talent and person.

text.text: Vince is really the best of both worlds when it comes to hiring a photographer. He is extremely personable and professional. Very easy to work with, exceptional work, and very timely with his deliverables. His platform is also SUPER user friendly when you need to retrieve photos. Our company continues to hire him for every event we have (almost 3 years now!) which is a true testament to his talent and person.

originalText.text: A few years ago, I found Vince's incredibly impressive travel photography work online and wasn't sure if he did corporate events. Turns out ours was his first, so in a way we took a chance, and man am I glad we did! I really can't say enough about the quality of his work and how much care, energy, and passion he puts into all of it. It's not easy to make a business event look exciting and beautiful, but somehow he does. He has a way with his subjects and making them feel comfortable, engaged, and open that works in any setting whether it's a business conference or somewhere in Bhutan. He's really one of the most versatile and talented photographers I have the pleasure of knowing, and we plan to hire him again and again.

originalText.text: Vincent shot a jazz festival and the gala I chaired.  He is amazing.  He gets people to relax and take great shots.  I love his work.

text.text: Vincent shot a jazz festival and the gala I chaired.  He is amazing.  He gets people to relax and take great shots.  I love his work.

originalText.text: Excellent travel, culture and events photographer. Professional to collaborate with. Creative with ideas. Great personality to amplify character of subjects on shoots. Highly recommended.
